title: I’m joining OpenAI
summary:
The creator of OpenClaw has announced they are joining OpenAI to focus on making AI agents universally accessible. Following a period of significant buzz and unexpected opportunities for their project, the author decided against building a large company. Instead, driven by a passion for building and a desire to "change the world," they view joining OpenAI as the fastest way to achieve their mission of creating an intuitive agent, even for non-technical users, by leveraging cutting-edge models and research.

OpenClaw itself will transition into a foundation, ensuring its continued existence as an open-source, independent project. OpenAI has committed to sponsoring OpenClaw and enabling the author to dedicate time to its community. The foundation aims to support thinkers, hackers, and individuals valuing data ownership, with plans to expand support for various models and companies.

After discussions with major labs, the author found a shared vision with OpenAI, expressing excitement about joining the frontier of AI research and development.
chinese_title: 我加入 OpenAI
chinese_summary:
OpenClaw 的创建者宣布他们将加入 OpenAI，专注于让 AI 智能体普及。在项目获得广泛关注和意想不到的机会之后，作者决定不创建一家大公司。相反，出于对创造的热情和“改变世界”的愿望，他们认为加入 OpenAI 是实现其使命的最快途径，即通过利用尖端模型和研究，创建即使是非技术用户也能直观使用的智能体。

OpenClaw 本身将转型为一个基金会，确保其作为一个开源、独立项目的持续存在。OpenAI 已承诺赞助 OpenClaw，并使作者能够将其时间投入到社区中。该基金会旨在支持思想家、黑客以及重视数据所有权的个人，并计划扩大对各种模型和公司的支持。

在与主要实验室讨论后，作者发现与 OpenAI 拥有共同的愿景，并表达了对加入 AI 研发前沿的兴奋之情。

title: I want to wash my car. The car wash is 50 meters away. Should I walk or drive?
summary: The article presents a question from a Mastodon user named Kévin, who is seeking advice on whether to walk or drive his car to a car wash located just 50 meters away. The core dilemma revolves around the most practical and sensible method for transporting the vehicle for washing given such a short distance. The accompanying text also includes a technical note about Mastodon's web app requiring JavaScript.
chinese_title: 我想洗车。洗车房在50米外。我应该走路还是开车？
chinese_summary: 这篇文章展示了Mastodon用户Kévin提出的一个问题，他正在寻求建议，纠结于是否应该步行还是开车去一个仅50米远的洗车店。核心困境是，考虑到如此短的距离，如何以最实用、最明智的方式将车辆送去清洗。附带的文字还包含一个技术说明，指出Mastodon的网页应用需要JavaScript。

title: EU bans the destruction of unsold apparel, clothing, accessories and footwear
chinese_title: EU bans the destruction of unsold apparel, clothing, accessories and footwear

title: I love the work of the ArchWiki maintainers
summary:
On "I love Free Software Day," the author expresses deep gratitude to documentation maintainers, particularly those of the ArchWiki, for their underrecognized contributions to software freedom. The ArchWiki is lauded as an indispensable resource, regularly consulted by the author and others—even for non-Arch-related Free Software. It's praised for helping users understand tools, discover features, resolve setup issues, and generally serving as a primary source for software knowledge.

The author describes the ArchWiki as a "pearl of the internet," echoing Edward Snowden's sentiment that it stands out as a reliable source of useful information amidst declining search result quality. The article thanks all ArchWiki contributors for sharing their knowledge and maintainers for ensuring the resource's long-term availability and reliability. Readers are encouraged to thank the maintainers and consider donating to the Arch project.
chinese_title: 我喜欢ArchWiki维护者们的工作。
chinese_summary:
在“我爱自由软件日”之际，作者对文档维护者，尤其是ArchWiki的维护者深表感谢，感谢他们对软件自由做出的、却常被低估的贡献。ArchWiki被誉为不可或缺的资源，作者及他人经常查阅，甚至是为了与Arch无关的自由软件。它因帮助用户理解工具、发现功能、解决设置问题，并通常作为软件知识的主要来源而备受赞誉。

作者将ArchWiki描述为“互联网的明珠”，这呼应了爱德华·斯诺登的观点，即在搜索结果质量不断下降的背景下，ArchWiki作为可靠的有用信息来源脱颖而出。文章感谢所有ArchWiki贡献者分享他们的知识，并感谢维护者确保该资源的长期可用性和可靠性。文章鼓励读者感谢维护者，并考虑向Arch项目捐款。

title: Amazon's Ring and Google's Nest reveal the severity of U.S. surveillance state
summary:
Glenn Greenwald argues that Amazon's Ring and Google's Nest, while presented as consumer home security products, are actually critical components of a pervasive domestic surveillance state in the U.S. Police departments actively foster partnerships with these companies, receiving discounts, free devices, and direct avenues to access extensive video footage.

Through neighborhood apps like Ring Neighbors, law enforcement can solicit video from homeowners, often circumventing traditional warrant requirements and legal safeguards. This creates a vast, unregulated network where millions of private cameras effectively become public surveillance tools. Greenwald contends that consumers, by purchasing these devices, inadvertently contribute to a system that collects immense amounts of data on individuals, homes, and neighborhoods, all accessible to authorities without meaningful democratic oversight or legislative limits.

This erosion of privacy and expansion of police power, facilitated by private tech companies, transforms private citizens into unwitting participants in an ever-growing surveillance apparatus, fundamentally altering the balance between personal liberty and state control.
chinese_title: 亚马逊的Ring和谷歌的Nest揭示了美国监控国家的严重性。
chinese_summary:
格林沃尔德认为，亚马逊的 Ring 和谷歌的 Nest 尽管被宣传为消费者家庭安防产品，但实际上是美国无处不在的国内监控国家的重要组成部分。警察部门积极与这些公司建立伙伴关系，获得折扣、免费设备，并开辟了直接访问大量视频素材的途径。

通过 Ring Neighbors 等社区应用程序，执法部门可以向房主征集视频，这通常规避了传统的搜查令要求和法律保障。这建立了一个庞大且不受监管的网络，其中数百万个私人摄像头实际上变成了公共监控工具。格林沃尔德认为，消费者通过购买这些设备，无意中助长了一个收集大量个人、家庭和社区数据的系统，而所有这些数据，当局都可以在缺乏有意义的民主监督或立法限制的情况下获取。

由私人科技公司促成的这种隐私侵蚀和警权扩张，将普通公民变成了日益增长的监控机器中不知情的参与者，从根本上改变了个人自由与国家控制之间的平衡。

title: I fixed Windows native development
chinese_title: I fixed Windows native development

title: Modern CSS Code Snippets: Stop writing CSS like it's 2015
summary:
The article "Modern CSS Code Snippets" champions a shift from outdated CSS techniques to powerful, native solutions, declaring that it's time to "stop writing CSS like it's 2015." Updated for 2026, it provides side-by-side comparisons of "Old" hacks versus "Modern" CSS, showcasing how many common problems now have clean, native replacements that reduce reliance on JavaScript.

Key areas of modernization include:
*   **Layout:** Centering is simplified with `place-items: center`, `inset` replaces four-property positioning, and `gap` streamlines spacing. Responsive images use `object-fit`, `scrollbar-gutter` prevents layout shift, and `overscroll-behavior` stops scroll chaining. Modals and tooltips leverage native `dialog` and `popover` elements, while `grid-template-areas` and `subgrid` enhance grid layouts.
*   **Color:** `oklch` allows for perceptually uniform colors and easy shade variants, while `light-dark()` simplifies dark mode styling.
*   **Typography:** `text-wrap: balance` ensures readable headlines, `initial-letter` creates drop caps, and `font-display: swap` improves font loading. `clamp()` enables fluid typography.
*   **Animation:** Independent transforms (`translate`, `rotate`, `scale`), `transition-behavior: allow-discrete` for `display: none` transitions, and `view-transition-name` for page transitions offer smoother, native effects.
*   **Workflow & Selectors:** `@scope` provides encapsulated styles, `@layer` manages specificity, and `@property` enables animatable custom properties. `:user-invalid` and `:focus-visible` enhance form validation and accessibility. `content-visibility: auto` offers lazy rendering.

The guide encourages developers to adopt these modern CSS features for more efficient, robust, and native web development, moving away from complex workarounds and JavaScript dependencies.
chinese_title: 现代 CSS 代码片段：别再用2015年的方式写CSS了
chinese_summary:
《现代 CSS 代码片段》一文倡导从过时的 CSS 技术转向强大、原生的解决方案，宣称是时候“停止编写2015年那样的CSS代码了”。该文章已更新至2026年，并对“旧”的hack方法与“现代”CSS进行了并列比较，展示了许多常见问题现在都有了简洁的原生替代方案，从而减少了对 JavaScript 的依赖。

现代化的关键领域包括：
*   **布局：** 使用 `place-items: center` 简化了居中布局，`inset` 替代了四属性定位，`gap` 简化了间距。响应式图像使用 `object-fit`，`scrollbar-gutter` 避免了布局偏移，`overscroll-behavior` 阻止了滚动链。模态框和工具提示利用原生的 `dialog` 和 `popover` 元素，而 `grid-template-areas` 和 `subgrid` 则增强了网格布局。
*   **颜色：** `oklch` 实现了感知均匀的颜色和方便的明暗变体，而 `light-dark()` 简化了暗模式样式。
*   **排版：** `text-wrap: balance` 确保了可读的标题，`initial-letter` 创建了首字下沉效果，`font-display: swap` 改进了字体加载。`clamp()` 实现了流畅的排版。
*   **动画：** 独立的变换 (`translate`, `rotate`, `scale`)，`transition-behavior: allow-discrete` 用于 `display: none` 的过渡，以及 `view-transition-name` 用于页面过渡，提供了更流畅的原生效果。
*   **工作流与选择器：** `@scope` 提供了封装样式，`@layer` 管理了特异性，而 `@property` 实现了可动画的自定义属性。`:user-invalid` 和 `:focus-visible` 增强了表单验证和可访问性。`content-visibility: auto` 提供了惰性渲染。

该指南鼓励开发人员采用这些现代 CSS 特性，以实现更高效、健壮和原生的 Web 开发，摆脱复杂的变通方法和 JavaScript 依赖。

title: News publishers limit Internet Archive access due to AI scraping concerns
summary:
News publishers are increasingly limiting the Internet Archive's access to their content, fearing that AI companies are using its vast repository, particularly the Wayback Machine, to scrape data for training models. This proactive stance aims to safeguard their intellectual property from unauthorized use.

Major outlets such as The Guardian, The New York Times, and The Financial Times have implemented restrictions. The Guardian limits the Internet Archive's API access and filters article pages from the Wayback Machine, concerned about structured data being easily siphoned by AI. The New York Times has "hard blocked" the Archive's crawlers, citing "unfettered access" for AI companies. Reddit also blocked the Archive, noting instances of AI companies violating policies via its archives.

Internet Archive founder Brewster Kahle argues that these restrictions hinder public access to the historical record, undermining their mission to counter "information disorder." However, evidence suggests the Wayback Machine has contributed to LLM training datasets, and an AI company once caused a server overload by bulk scraping. The Archive itself has taken steps to restrict bulk downloading.

An analysis of 1,167 news sites revealed 241, particularly those owned by USA Today Co. (Gannett), explicitly disallow Internet Archive bots in their robots.txt files. Gannett, which reported blocking 75 million AI bots in one month, emphasizes protecting its content.

This situation presents a dilemma: while publishers protect their content, the Internet Archive provides a crucial service, preserving digital history that many news organizations often fail to archive themselves. The Archive, seen as "good guys," is becoming "collateral damage" in the broader effort to control AI scraping.
chinese_title: 新闻媒体因AI抓取担忧，限制互联网档案馆访问。
chinese_summary:
新闻出版商正日益限制互联网档案馆访问其内容，担心人工智能公司利用互联网档案馆庞大的资料库，特别是“时光机”（Wayback Machine），抓取数据以训练模型。这种主动姿态旨在保护其知识产权免遭未经授权的使用。

卫报、纽约时报和金融时报等主要媒体机构已实施限制。《卫报》限制互联网档案馆的API访问，并从“时光机”中过滤文章页面，担心结构化数据被人工智能轻易获取。《纽约时报》则“彻底屏蔽”了互联网档案馆的爬虫，理由是人工智能公司可“不受限制地访问”。Reddit也屏蔽了互联网档案馆，并指出有迹象表明人工智能公司通过其档案违反了政策。

互联网档案馆创始人布鲁斯特·卡利（Brewster Kahle）认为，这些限制阻碍了公众获取历史记录，削弱了他们打击“信息失序”的使命。然而，有证据表明“时光机”已为大型语言模型（LLM）的训练数据集做出了贡献，一家人工智能公司曾因批量抓取导致服务器过载。互联网档案馆本身也已采取措施限制批量下载。

对1,167个新闻网站的分析显示，其中241个，特别是《今日美国》母公司甘尼特（Gannett）旗下的网站，已在其robots.txt文件中明确禁止互联网档案馆的爬虫。甘尼特曾报告在一个月内屏蔽了7500万个人工智能爬虫，并强调保护其内容。

这种情况带来了一个两难困境：出版商在保护自身内容的同时，互联网档案馆提供了一项关键服务，保存着许多新闻机构自身往往未能妥善归档的数字历史。互联网档案馆被视为“好人”，但在更广泛地控制人工智能抓取的努力中，正成为“附带损害”。

title: Oat – Ultra-lightweight, zero dependency, semantic HTML, CSS, JS UI library
summary: Oat is presented as an ultra-lightweight, zero-dependency UI library that leverages semantic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Its primary distinguishing feature is its minuscule file size: the entire library weighs in at just 6KB for CSS and 2.2KB for JS, both figures being for minified and gzipped versions.
chinese_title: Oat – 超轻量、零依赖、语义化 HTML、CSS、JS UI 库
chinese_summary: Oat 被描述为一个超轻量级、零依赖的 UI 库，它利用语义化 HTML、CSS 和 JavaScript。其最显著的特点是极小的文件体积：整个库的 CSS 文件仅为 6KB，JS 文件仅为 2.2KB，这两个数据均指经过精简和 Gzip 压缩后的版本。
